name: Yuriy
whatwork: By clicking on the 'Add to watched' button, the movie is added to the watched movies of the current user (local-storage). By clicking on the 'Add to queue' button, the movie is added to the queue of the current user (localstorage).

name: Anna
whatwork: Mark up the header of the main page (mobile, tablet, desktop). By clicking on the logo/button 'Home' the main page is drawn. By clicking on the 'My Library' button, the user's library is drawn. Mark up header for 'My Library' page (mobile, tablet, desktop)

name: Dmitry
whatwork: Implemented loading of popular films on the main page. Implemented search and rendering of movies by keyword. Design the main page container for the correct positioning of movie cards (mobile, tablet, desktop).

name: Marina
whatwork: Mark up the footer (mobile, tablet, desktop). Marked up a single movie card template.

name: Yura
whatwork: Pagination on the main page. When switching to each page, draw the corresponding part of the movies.

name: Vladislav
whatwork: Marked up the modal template for one movie (mobile, tablet, desktop). Implemented closing the modal by pressing the ESC key and by clicking outside the modal area, did not forget to remove the listeners. By clicking on the movie card on any page, a modal should open with dynamically inserted information about the movie.

name: Nazarii
whatwork: Marked up the 'My Library' page container for the correct positioning of movie cards (mobile, tablet, desktop).

name: Nataliya
whatwork: Connected spinner for asynchronous requests. By clicking on the 'Watched' button, the user's watched movies are shown. By clicking on the 'Queue' button, movies added to the user's queue are shown.

name: Pavlo
whatwork: Mark up the modal (mobile, tablet, desktop) with information about team members, which will be opened by clicking on the text 'GoIT Students' in the footer.
